name: 許益瑞
objective:
The course is designed to provide the basic knowledge on molecular science and material science. In order to discuss the molecular science, we need the background of modern physics because the atoms consist of molecules. To get insight into the materials, we have to understand the chemical bonding and molecular orbitals because material is a collective mass of molecules. Thus, this course covers the fundamental modern physics, quantum chemistry, and solid state. With all these background knowledge, we will further discuss the material properties, such as electricity and magnetism if time is allowed. 
Outline: 
1.	Introduction
2.	Introduction to Modern Physics: Quantum Theory and Atomic Structure
3.	Chemical Bonds and Molecular Orbital Theory
4.	Introduction to Solid State
5.	Crystals and Amorphous materials
6.	Metallic Materials
7.	Inorganic Materials
8.	Polymers
9.	Nanomaterials
